msDesc.p: L. D. Institute MS catalogue serial no. 6498, accession no. 7753, described in Catalogue of Sanskrit and Prakrit manuscripts. Munirāja śrī Puṇyavijayaji’s collection, (Ahmedabad: L. D. Institute, 1963-68). The text with the ṭippaṇa of Govindabhadra. Leaves 3-66, 70-78, 90-95. 9 lines/page, 25 akṣaras/line of large Devanāgarī. Numbered verses throughout.

lg.l: sarvauvyadhānāṃ kṛtayogam+ekataḥ sasthaichasvapalvair+varayogaratnaiḥ na yāti tulyaṃ naranāthabhūtale raseṃdrayogā+chatakoṭir+aṃśataḥ 17
malaṃ viṣaṃ vanhigurutvacāpalaṃ naisārgikaṃ doṣam+uśaṃti tajñā | aupādhikau dvau trapunāgasaṃbhavau raseṃdrarāje kathayaṃti tajñāḥ 18
malena mūrchāśiṣinā ca doṣaṃ viṣeṇa mṛtyuṃ pravadaṃti saṃtaḥ gurutvadoṣeṇa karoti śūlaṃ na tiṣṭate taccapalatvadoṣāt 19
dvau nāgavaṃgau pravalau ca doṣau syus+tatprabhāvād+galagaṃḍa doṣāḥgulmāḥ aśuddhasūtaṃ lihitaṃ pramādāt karoti kruṣṭaṃ pravalaṃ raseṃdraḥ20

tasmādādau kīrttitāni karmmāṇy+aṣṭādaśaiva tu pūrvācāryai raseṃdrastha
jñātavyāni prayatnataḥ 21
saṃsvedanaṃ marddanamūrchanaṃ syād+ucchāpanaṃ pātanadīpanaṃ ca niyāmanaṃ ruṃdhanacaraṇaṃ ca dvaṃdvaṃ hutīnāṃ dravagarbhajāraṇaṃ22
grāsapramāṇaṃ vidhiraṃcjanaṃ ca saṃsāraṇaṃ krāmaṇavedayogaṃ na vetti yo vai vapuṣi prayuṃjanaṃ raseṃdrarājasya karo nāśaṃ 23
tasmāt+sūtavidā sārddhaṃ sahāyair+nipuṇair+yutaḥ sarvopaskam+ādāya rasakarma samārabhet 24
dve sehalepalānāṃ ca sahasraṃ śataveva vā palīdhāneva saṃsvāraḥ karttavyaḥ sūtakasya tu 25
sudine śubhanakṣatre rasasośodhanam+ārabhet 26

pūlapatraṃ citrakaraktasavyaṃ pā aumārikaṃnyā vṛhatīkaṣāyaiḥ vimardya sūtaṃ tridināni yāvad+vimucyate paṃca
malādidoṣaiḥ27
saptavāram+adha ūrddhvapātananmlechamiśritarasasya piṣṭikā mucate rigitidoṣasūtakaṃ nāgavaṃgagurutāpi cāpalaṃ28
nāgavalātivalāvarṣā bhūmeṣmaviṣāṇi yutaṃ ṣananādaṃ ebhi rasair+mathitaṃ navavāraṃ svedamidaṃ tridinaṃ rasarāje29
rasasya ṣoḍaśāṃśena tryūṣaṇaṃ paṭurājikā laḍusaṃkhyātrayaṃ caiva āranālaṃ samānayet 30
sarvadhānyāmlasaṃdhānaṃ tuṣavarjaṃ tu kārayet tatas+tatraiva saṃdhāne nikṣiped+auṣaṣair+imaiḥ 31
girikarṇī va mīnākṣī sahadevī punarnavā uragā triphalā grāṃtā laṣuparṇaśatāvarī 32

tena yuktaṃ rasaṃ svinnaṃ tridinaṃ mṛdu
vahninā dolāyaṃtreṇa tīvreṇa marddayitvā punaḥ punaḥ svedanaṃ ūrṇāharidrapaṭur+iṣṭakāmlaiḥ samāranālair+gṛhadhūmamiśraiḥ siddhārtharājīvi dināni ṣalve saṃmarddanaṃ sūta uśaṃti saṃtaḥ 33
iti marddanaṃ
rājikārkayayakākamācikā meṣaśṛṃgirasakṛṣṇahaimajaṃ āranālasahitaṃ sutāpitaṃ saptavārarasarājamūrchanaṃ 34
iti mūrchanaṃ
kaṃcukī ca garuḍī varāhikā naṃdinīśvarivalā ca śūlinī sūryavallirasarājamārdditaṃ mūrchati bhramati yāti paṃca?tāṃ 35
ity+utthāpanaṃ pātanaṃ pūrvavat

ādhārddhayaṃtravidhinā pātayitvā niyojayet kṣaudrāmlalavaṇakṣāra āranāle
na saṃyutaḥ 36
dīpayet+triṇivārāṇi āhārārthaṃ tu sūtakaṃ sṛṣṭyāṃvujair+yuto rodhā agninā sūtakasya ca 37
iti rodhanaṃ
karkoṭī kaṃcukī yogaṃ yojayet+tu niyāmake nirmalas+tejavān sūto jāyate nātra saṃśayaḥ
niyāmanaṃ
kīratuṃḍi garuḍī ṛṣichaṃdā kaṃnyakā aumarikā vṛvāyasī āsurī ca vijayā jayā jayā vahnidīpanakarā ca sūtake39
iti dīpanaṃ
aparāṇy+agre vakṣyāmaḥ
iti rasaśodhanaṃ
apy+āho mahārasaśodhanaṃ
kim+atra citraṃ yadi rājavarttakaṃ śarīṣapuṣpārdrarasena bhāvitaṃ kima?tra citraṃ yadi pītagaṃdhakaṃ paṃjāśayaṣṭīmahagaṃdhabhāvitaṃ sitaṃ suvarṇaṃ tadgaṇārkasannibhaṃ karoti guṃjāśatam ekaguṃjayā1
āraṇyakair+utpalakaiḥ supācitaṃ karoti tāraṃ tripuṭena kāṃcana 40
rājāva?ṃśuddhiḥ
kimatra citraṃ rasakaṃ rasena rajaḥsvalāyāḥ kusumena bhāvitaṃ krameṇa kṛtvā turageṇa raṃjitaṃ karoti śulvaṃ tripuṭena kaṃcanaṃ41
iti rasakaśuddhiḥ
kiṃmatra citraṃ daradaṃ subhāvi subhāvitaṃ payena meṣī vahuśo amlapagaiva sitaṃ suvarṇaṃ vahudharmatāpitaṃ karoti sākṣād+varaku aumaprabhāṃ42
iti daradaśuddhiḥ
kulako dravakvāthe naramūtreṇa pācayet vetasāmlā?mlavargeṇa datvā kṣāraṃ paṭutrayaṃ 43
kim+atra citraṃ kadalīrasena supācitaṃ suraṇakaṃdasaṃsthaṃ vānāritailena ghṛtena tāpyaṃ puṭena dagdhaṃ varaśuddhim+eti 44
iti mākṣikāśodhanaṃ
iti mahārasaśuddhiḥ
munikusumarasasubhāvitā manaḥśilā vārān sapta śuddhim+eti kūṣmāṃḍarasena tālaṃ śuddhyati sākṣād+dinaikena 45
kṣāraiḥ snehair+ādau paścād+amlena bhāvitā vahuśaḥ śuddhyati rasoparasā aparā api dhātavaḥ sarve46
aparadhātuśuddhiḥ
kaṃḍūlikādhanaravaḥ karavīrakīrajaṃvīranīraka paceta samāranālaiḥ raktotpalair+ṛṣavaśāśamiśarṅgatailasaṃpācitaṃ ca gaganaṃ rasarūpiṇaṃ syāt47
saptarātreṇābhrakaśuddhiḥ
śyāmā śamī madanako dravamūṣakarṇī śṛgīkaṭodbhavadhanadhvanivetasānāṃ kvāthaṃ kulitchajaghanīraṃjanīrasūrasaṃ pācito hi tridinaiḥ pariśuddhim+eti 48
ghanīraṃ punarnavā sūraṃ sūraṇaṃ
iti vajraśodhanaṃ

vaikrīta
saptaparipācitam+amlamūtrai kṣārais+tathā paṭuvasā ṛṣamehamiśraiḥ kvāthena kodravakulatthasamudbhavena saṃsveditās+tridinam+āśu bhavaṃti śuddhāḥ49
iti vaikrāṃtaśodhanaṃ
dvividhā vimalāṣāraṃ bhātoyena saṃyutā lavaṇe vajradugdhena tāmrapatrāṇi lepayet50
agnau saṃtāpya ? nirguṃḍīrase siktaṃ ca saptadhā māravārkasya rasenaiva śulvaśuddhir+bhaviṣyati51
purataḥ sarvalohapatraśodhanaṃ
amlavetasadhānyāṃvu meṣītoyena śuddhyati
vimalaśuddhiḥ 52
capalādyā dhātavaḥ sarve jaṃvīrarasabhāvitāḥ karkoṭīśṛṃgikātoyai śuddhyate nātra saṃśayaḥ 53
iti sarvarasaśuddhiḥ

vīja
pūrakaphalāmlavhāvitāḥ śoṣitās+tridinapaṃcamṛttikāḥ bhūtibhasmalavaṇena saṃyutā śodhayaṃti puṭapākakāṃcanaṃ54
hemaśodhanaṃ
nāgena kṣāraḥ rājena drāvitaṃ śuddhim+ṛchati tāras+trivāranikṣiptaḥ piśācītailamadhyataḥ55
tāraśuddhiḥ
aho na citraṃ pṛthivībhaṭena kṣāreṇa meṣīpayasā ghṛtena tailena viddhaṃ hṛtaṣoḍaśāṃśe bhavec+ca śulvaṃ śaśiśaṃkhasannibhaṃ56
ayaḥ prakāśoddhṛtaṃ śulvamāroṭam+athavā vudhaḥ ṣaḍguṇena ca nāgena śoṣayitvā tato budhaḥ 57
śatārddhaṃsiṃduvārastu rasamadhye tu ṭālayet kūṣmāaṃḍakarase paścāt niraṣakātsupta dāyapet
śatārddhaṃ siṃduvāras+tu rasamadhye tu ḍhālayet kūṣmāṃḍakarase paścāt niraṣakātsupta dāyapet58

tatastakre niśāyukte
punaḥ saptaiva dāpayet śulvasya kālikā brāhmevaṃ praṇasyati na saṃśayaḥ59
śukatuṃkiṃśukābhaṃ chede raktaṃ mṛdu tathā snigdhaṃ toyena bhavati kṛṣṇāṃtachulvaṃ kālikārahitaṃ60
śulvaśodhanaṃ
kṣāraṃ guḍaṃ haṃsapadaṃ ca lākṣārasena vṛṣṭāradalāni paścāt saṃlipyakaṃ kruṣṭaniśānvitena sudhāmitā śuddhyati saptavārān61
āraśodhanaṃ
kṣāraṃ puṭaṃ kaṇayutaṃ lavaṇoni paṃca jaṃvīranīraparibhāvitasaptavārān kalke bhateparilipyapuṭena dagdhā tārāraśulvaghanaghoṣam+upaiti śuddhiṃ62
ghoṣaśodhanaṃ

haṃsānhi vallyām avaratnamālikā kalatrayaṃ tuṃ varalohanighnakaḥ gopālikākogora
sanāguḍacī haraṃti sarve giridoṣam+āyasāt 63
iti tīkṣṇuśodhanaṃ
gaurīphalāni rajanīkṣurakaḥ kuṭeravījāni tuṃ varayutāni ca mallikāyāḥ kṣārāṇi mokṣakapalāsamayūrajāni saṃbhāvitāni payasā kuliśaṃḍūmasya 64
cārāṇi saptaparitāpitanāgarājaṃ kalvena tena khalu śuddhim+upaiti sadyaḥ yuktyā krameṇa yadi siktapayena dullī staṃbhaṃ karoti kuṭilasya vadaṃti saṃtaḥ65
nāgaśodhanaṃ
arkonmattas+tu hi payahalinī kaṃcukī ratnamākṣālāguṃjāvahniḥ surapatisurā iṃgūdī cāśvagaṃdhā takre piṣṭaṃ malaharam+idaṃ sarvalohaprasiddhaṃ vaṃgastaṃbhaṃ kṣaṇam+api kurute ṣvoniṣo nāma yogaḥ66
vaṃgaśodhanaṃ
iti śrīśrīmannāgārjjunaviracite raseṃdramaṃgale rasoparasalohaśodhanādhikāraḥ prathamaḥ1
